title: Champ sale D:
body: Hello, i want to ask if you can please put renger, kha zix andd hec on sale for the next update please if you can't all 3 then please at least 1 of them i want to buy all 3 :(

replies.body:
Why don't you just spend half of your life grinding IP.

You might have enough by then to buy half a champion.
The schedule says that Kha'zix will be on sale some time this month. Rengae and Hecarim won't be on sale this month.
